scripts.db:seed: sqlite3 database/matcha.db < scripts/users_seed.sql && sqlite3 database/matcha.db < scripts/user_pictures_seed.sql && sqlite3 database/matcha.db < scripts/user_interests_seed.sql && sqlite3 database/matcha.db < scripts/user_locations_seed.sql && sqlite3 database/matcha.db < scripts/fame_ratings_seed.sql && sqlite3 database/matcha.db < scripts/user_onlines_seed.sql
scripts.db:full-reset: npm run db:reset && npm run db:seed
